TheHunted:AnemicSlap.NAME: Anemic Slap
TheHunted:AnemicSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Weak to yourself.

TheHunted:CrashingBlow.NAME: Crashing Blow
TheHunted:CrashingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Lose !TheHunted:WardenGainLoseAmountVariable! ground.

TheHunted:Evade.NAME: Evade
TheHunted:Evade.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Acquire !TheHunted:WardenGainLoseAmountVariable! ground.

TheHunted:Perseverance.NAME: Perseverance
TheHunted:Perseverance.DESCRIPTION: Gain ground whenever you shuffle your draw pile.

TheHunted:Scramble.NAME: Scramble
TheHunted:Scramble.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Gain 1 energy. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Discard a card. NL Acquire !TheHunted:WardenGainLoseAmountVariable! ground.
